original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl WHERE c.UserId = p.OwnerUserId AND p.Id = pl.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND p.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-09-06 00:58:21' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 10:02:21' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-07-09 22:35:44' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-09-06 00:58:21' AND CAST(posts.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 10:02:21'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND postLinks.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2011-07-09 22:35:44'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.Id=E3.PostId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.OwnerUserId)
